is.ru.tictactoe

Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.tictactoe.TicTacToe

  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object
    The TicTacToe class is the brain of the application. It contains the business logic behind the game by connecting all the other classes together. It runs the game.
